info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 15 at 8:29PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...Scattered to numerous showers and thunderstorms producing heavy rainfall across portions of Portage, Trumbull, northwestern Mahoning, Geauga, Lake, northeastern Stark, Ashtabula, Erie and Crawford Counties through 930 PM EDT... At 826 PM EDT, Doppler radar indicated scattered to numerous showers and thunderstorms across the region, moving northeast at 25 mph. Locally heavy rainfall will continue with ponding of water on area roadways possible. HAZARD...Locally heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Ponding of water on area roadways. Locations impacted include... Erie, Youngstown, Warren, Painesville, Ashtabula, Meadville, Conneaut, Ravenna, Chardon, Fairport Harbor, Geneva-On-The-Lake, Mentor, Kent, Niles, Tallmadge, North Canton, Streetsboro, Hubbard, Cortland and Corry. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
